name: Barnaby Buoyant
description:
The adventures of Barnaby Buoyant & Barbara Bounds, the cowardly coastguard duo! A whimsical platform game set by the seaside, with a cheeky sense of humour and some eerie themes as you explore the vast coast! 

This is a very early gameplay Demo of Barnaby Buoyant, a game I've been developing for many years, alongside my full-time job so progress will be very slow. I'm looking to get a little feedback mostly on how well the game runs on various hardware, though please feel free to give critique on the gameplay if you like. I believe there will be some frame rate issues on older hardware, especially in full-screen mode. 

There are instructions about gameplay and controls in the enclosed Read Me. Barnaby Buoyant is being developed in Clickteam Fusion 2.5. Please note that the game is still in early stages and things will likely still change in the final release. (Audio is still in early stages, not looping properly as of yet.

Game and pixel art by Liam Reddington

Illustrations by Ewelina Mroczkowska

Music by Hernan Marandino

For now the demo contains only the first level - Please feel free to follow development on @LiamReddington on twitter. 

Video of Demo Level: https://youtu.be/FLPj_2TEFTI
